price: ហើយពួកគេបានយកម្ចាស់ផេ្សងៗមកគោរពសក្ការៈក្រៅ ពីអល់ឡោះ ដោយពួកគេសង្ឃឹមថា ពួកគេនឹងត្រូវគេ(ម្ចាស់ផេ្សង) ជួយ។
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan laʿallahum yunṣarūna
